sn46.44:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn46.44:1.3: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, ‘duppanno elamugo’ti vuccati”ti?
sn46.44:1.4: “Sattannam kho, bhikkhu, bojjhanganam abhavitatta abahulikatatta ‘duppanno elamugo’ti vuccati.
sn46.44:1.7: imesam kho, bhikkhu, sattannam bojjhanganam abhavitatta abahulikatatta ‘duppanno elamugo’ti vuccati”ti.
